mapper.select: SELECT b.banner_no AS bannerNo , b.banner_product AS bannerProduct , b.banner_company AS bannerCompany , b.banner_filename AS bannerFileName , b.banner_count AS bannerCount , DATE_FORMAT(b.banner_date,'%p %Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS bannerDate , DATE_FORMAT(b.banner_servicestart,'%p %Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS bannerServiceStart , DATE_FORMAT(b.banner_serviceend,'%p %Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS bannerServiceEnd , b.banner_status AS bannerStatus , u.user_nickname as userNickname FROM banner AS b INNER JOIN user AS u ON b.user_no = u.user_no WHERE b.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY banner_no DESC
